Statement.name: getEmbargoRecord
Statement.sqlString: select firm_id, email_domain, anon_days, full_days, active_from from firm_embargo_domain where firm_id = ? and email_domain = ?

Statement.name: getEmbargoRecordsForFirmId
Statement.sqlString: select firm_id, email_domain, anon_days, full_days, active_from from firm_embargo_domain where firm_id = ?

Statement.name: getEmbargoRecords
Statement.sqlString: select firm_id, email_domain, anon_days, full_days, active_from from firm_embargo_domain

Statement.name: deleteEmbargoRecord
Statement.sqlString: delete from firm_embargo_domain where firm_id = ? and email_domain = ?

Statement.name: insertEmbargoRecord
Statement.sqlString: insert into firm_embargo_domain (firm_id, email_domain, anon_days, full_days, active_from) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
